title: Automate Invoice Data Entry via OCR
description: As a Consumer registering a new product, I want the system to automatically extract key details (Date, Model, Serial Number) from my uploaded invoice image, so that I can register my product quickly without manual data entry errors.
business_value: Reduces user friction during onboarding, improves data accuracy for warranty validation, and showcases platform technological maturity.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successful OCR Extraction","given":"The user is on the product registration screen","when":"The user uploads a clear image of an invoice (JPG/PNG/PDF)","then":"The system processes the image via Azure AI Document Intelligence, and the Date, Model, and Serial Number fields are pre-populated within 5 seconds."},{"scenario":"OCR Failure / Fallback","given":"The OCR service is unavailable or the image quality is too low","when":"The extraction process fails or returns low confidence scores","then":"The user is prompted to enter details manually, and the system logs the failure without crashing the application."}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-PROD-001: Implement Invoice OCR Processing Pipeline","Configure Azure Blob Storage for temporary file upload","Implement BullMQ/Service Bus consumer for async processing","Integrate Azure AI Document Intelligence API"]
definition_of_done: ["OCR pipeline successfully extracts data from test invoices","Retry logic implemented for AI service failures","Manual entry fallback verified","Unit tests covering payload parsing"]

title: Automated Geospatial Service Routing
description: As a Service Center Administrator, I want the system to automatically route incoming service requests to my center only if the user is within my defined geospatial service area and I am authorized for that brand, so that I only receive relevant and valid tickets.
business_value: Eliminates manual triage of tickets, reduces response time for customers (SLA compliance), and ensures contractual compliance regarding service territories.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Routing based on Location and Brand","given":"A user submits a request for a 'Samsung' product at coordinates inside Service Center A's polygon","when":"The request is processed","then":"The ticket is assigned to Service Center A, provided they are authorized for 'Samsung'."},{"scenario":"No Service Center Found","given":"A user submits a request from a location not covered by any authorized center","when":"The routing algorithm runs","then":"The system flags the ticket for manual Brand Admin review and notifies the user of a potential delay."}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-SERV-001: Implement Geospatial Service Routing Algorithm","Enable PostGIS extension on Azure PostgreSQL","Implement ST_Contains or ST_DWithin queries in NestJS","Implement Round-Robin logic for overlapping service areas"]
definition_of_done: ["Geospatial queries execute in < 200ms","Routing logic correctly handles overlapping polygons","Unit tests cover edge cases (outside boundary, no brand auth)"]

title: Technician Travel Mode & Real-time Tracking
description: As a Consumer awaiting service, I want to track the assigned technician's real-time location on a map when they are 'On The Way', so that I know exactly when to expect them and can ensure I am home.
business_value: Significantly improves customer satisfaction (CSAT), reduces 'Where is my tech?' support calls, and provides transparency/safety for the home visit.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Real-time Location Updates","given":"The technician has enabled 'Travel Mode' in their app","when":"The technician moves towards the destination","then":"The user's map view updates the technician's pin position with less than 2 seconds latency via WebSockets."},{"scenario":"Privacy & Data Cleanup","given":"The service job is marked as 'Resolved'","when":"24 hours have passed since completion","then":"All high-frequency GPS location history for that specific job is purged from the database for privacy compliance."}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-SERV-004: Technician Real-time Location Tracking Service","WI-APP-002: Implement Technician 'Travel Mode' Background Location","Configure WebSocket Gateway with Redis adapter","Implement throttling to optimize battery/bandwidth"]
definition_of_done: ["Latency tested to be under 2s","Background location capture works on iOS and Android (real device testing)","Data purge cron job implemented and verified"]

title: Offline Mode for Field Technicians
description: As a Technician working in areas with poor connectivity, I want to be able to view job details and save completion notes offline, so that I can continue working without interruption and sync data when I regain a signal.
business_value: Ensures operational continuity in the field, prevents data loss, and improves technician efficiency by removing network dependency for critical tasks.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Saving Notes Offline","given":"The technician is offline (no network)","when":"They update the job status or add resolution notes","then":"The data is persisted locally (SQLite/WatermelonDB) and the UI indicates a 'Pending Sync' status."},{"scenario":"Auto-Sync on Reconnect","given":"The technician has pending offline changes","when":"The device regains network connectivity","then":"The app automatically syncs the queued changes to the backend and resolves any conflicts (Server wins strategy)."}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-APP-003: Implement Offline Sync for Technician App","Setup WatermelonDB schema","Implement offline action queue","Implement background sync manager"]
definition_of_done: ["Offline changes persist across app restarts","Sync occurs automatically without user intervention","Conflict resolution logic verified"]
